p: At first it seemed that the COVED-19 spares the nervous system and neurologic complications were among the manifestations later to be identified. Now we know that both central and peripheral nervous system may be affected by COVID-19( Baig, 2020)( Mao et al., 2020). Involvement of central nervous system based on report by Helms et al. ranges from encephalopathy with agitation and confusion, and corticospinal tract signs to ischemic stroke( Helms et al., 2020). Peripheral nervous system is also affected by COVID-19, and several cases of acute polyneuropathy had recently reported.
